aka: The Netflix Afterparty: The Best Shows of the Worst Year

cast.name: 福琼·费姆斯特 Fortune Feimster

trans_title: The Netflix Afterparty: The Best Shows of the Worst Year
introduction: The Netflix Afterparty is a first-of-its-kind weekly comedy panel show where comedians, casts, and creators come to chat about the streaming giant's buzziest shows and films. Each episode will be dedicated to one of the latest Netflix movies or TV shows to hit the cultural zeitgeist, with the stars of that title participating in interviews, pop culture discussions, sketches and segments. Each week, the co-hosts will be joined by a different Netflix comedian to round out the panel.
